summary: Ragnarok Is An Ancient Draugr Warrior Buried Deep In The Throat Of The World.
descriptionHtml:
Ragnarok

Ragnarok Is An Ancient Draugr Warrior Buried Deep In The Throat Of The World.
His Tomb Can Be Found Behind The World Wall Where You Meet Paarthurnax.
When He Is Slain You Are Given The Book '' The Heart Of Ragnarok''.
This Book Shall Teach You The Spell ''Summon Ragnarok''.
You Now Have The Power To Summon His Ghost To Aid You In Battle.

Instalation: Place In Skyrim Data Folder
author: JP0005
